donation.0: Support zhe server and its development https://ko-fi.com/bunnynabbit

buildingCommands.0: Toggle paint mode by using zhe /paint command
buildingCommands.1: Place down a block at your position wizh zhe /place command
buildingCommands.2: Made a mistake? Enter zhe VCR wizh &a/vcr&r.
buildingCommands.3: Zhree-sided polygons named "triangles" are my favorite. &a/triangle&r.
buildingCommands.4: Need somezhing round? Use zhe /sphere command!
buildingCommands.5: Is zhe palette getting in zhe way? Use "/template empty" to clear it! Or use "/template builder" to bring it back.

gameTips.0: An entire game consists of 16 turns. When a game is completed, you can see all of its turns in zhe view mode.
gameTips.1: Want to practice building? Try building in a &a/realm&r level.
gameTips.2: Voxel Telephone has a bunch of commands. Use /help or view zhe help documentation on zhe web. https://voxel-telephone.bunnynabbit.com/help

safety.0: See an inappropriate prompt or build? Use &a/report&r.

taglines.0: Where words become worlds, and back again.
taglines.1: Build it, describe it, watch it evolve.
taglines.2: Get creative, get building, get talking.
taglines.3: From pixels to prose, and back again.

taglines.5: Whispers of blocks, echoes of imagination.
